title: Ever After
description: From the Back CoverShe walked away from her fairytale wedding in search of her true happily ever after.She hadn't counted on it coming searching for her first.Eight months after canceling her wedding, Ava Callahan finally has her life in order and sees nothing but blue skies ahead. A chance encounter with the man responsible for ruining her wedding has her newly organized world in chaos.Brian McCabe had preserved for eight long months seeking the woman he loves and his patience was about to expire. Purposely putting himself in every path Ava was on might not always work to his advantage, but he wanted to make sure that she truly saw him for who he was.Her happily ever after...
author: Samantha Chase
